participant_1.background:
I enjoy hiking with my horses and eating ginger snaps along the way.
i listen to rap.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
I was really upset when I saw my neighbor abusing his dog.

participant_2.background:
I help my grandparents with their daily activities.
i just accepted a job at the elementary school in my hometown.
I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications.
i have 3 dogs and a parrot.
I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you. How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm a writer, and I'm looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
That's great! What kind of stories do you write?
I write all sorts of stories, but I'm particularly interested in writing stories about people who are in need of help.
That's really great! I'm sure you'll find a job that will help you support yourself while you write your stories.
I'm sure you will! I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world.
Wow, that's amazing! How long was your journey?
It was about a year and a half.
That's incredible! What was the most interesting thing you saw?
I saw so many amazing things, but I think the most interesting thing was the people I met along the way.
That's great! I'm sure you have a lot of stories to tell.
I do! I'm excited to share them with my students.
